variable.name: HLPSICK_9
variable.description: Helping sick or frail family member or friend
variable.comment: Are you now helping at least one sick, limited, or frail family member of friend on a regular basis?

variable.name: HLPSICKT_9
variable.description: How often helped sick or frail family member or friend
variable.comment: In the past 4 weeks, how often have you helped this friend or family member? Sub-question of F149 V1 Q1 'Helping sick or frail family'.

variable.name: SPOUSDIE_9
variable.comment: Did your spouse or partner die?

variable.name: SPOUSILL_9
variable.comment: Did your spouse or partner have a serious illness?

variable.name: FRIENDIE_9
variable.comment: Did a close friend or family member die or have a serious illness (other than your spouse or partner)?

variable.name: MONPROB_9
variable.comment: Did you have any major problems with money?

variable.name: DIVORCE_9
variable.comment: Did you have a divorce or break-up with a spouse or partner?

variable.name: FRNDIV_9
variable.comment: Did a family member or close friend have a divorce or break-up?

variable.name: CHILCON_9
variable.comment: Did you have a major conflict with children or grandchildren?

variable.name: MAJACC_9
variable.comment: Do you have any major accident, disasters, muggings, unwanted sexual experiences, robberies, or similar events?

variable.name: FRNJOB_9
variable.comment: Did you or a family member or close friend lose their job or retire?

variable.name: PETDIE_9
variable.comment: Did a pet die?

variable.name: BRCA_9
variable.comment: Have you ever been diagnosed with breast cancer?

variable.name: BRCAAGE_9
variable.comment: At what age were you diagnosed? Sub-question of F149 V1 Q3 'Ever diagnosed w/breast cancer'

variable.name: WTLMERID_9
variable.comment: Meridia (Sibutramine)

variable.name: WTLXENCL_9
variable.comment: Xenical (Orlistat)

variable.name: WTLPHENT_9
variable.comment: Phentermine (Fastin)

variable.name: WTLOTHER_9
variable.comment: Other prescription weight loss medication

variable.name: MOMUSBRN_9
variable.comment: Was your mother born in the United States or outside of the United States?

variable.name: MOMUSREG_9
variable.comment: What region? Sub-question of F149 V1 Q5 'Mother born in US' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MOMWORLD_9
variable.comment: Which area? Sub-question of F149 V1 Q5.1 'US birth region' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: BIRTHMOM_9
variable.comment: Was this your biological (birth) mother?

variable.name: DADUSBRN_9
variable.comment: Was your father born in the United States or outside of the United States?

variable.name: DADUSREG_9
variable.comment: Which region? Sub-question of F149 V1 Q6 'Father born in US' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: DADWORLD_9
variable.comment: Which area? Sub-question of F149 V1 Q6.1 'US birth region' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: BIRTHDAD_9
variable.comment: Was this your biological (birth) father?
